original_text: And when the queen of Sheba had seen the wisdom of Solomon, the house that he had built,
korean_text: 스바 여왕이 솔로몬의 지혜와 그가 건축한 궁과

sentences.original_text: And when the queen of Sheba had seen the wisdom of Solomon,
sentences.korean_translation: 스바의 여왕이 솔로몬의 지혜를 보았을 때에,

sentences.original_text: the house that he had built,
